ComicInfo.Summary: Royal Flush, Queen High: Part Three Wild Card: Bomb Queen can't catch a break! New Port City's newest hero is twisting public opinion against her. The media is painting a smear campaign, and the goody two-shoes Robert Woods is winning the political race for Mayor. What's a super villain to do? Kill them all, of course!
ComicInfo.Tags: Brad Shelton,Bomb Queen,Senator Hillstone,Ashe,Ace Justice,Public Power,New Port City
